translations.chinese: 項羽聞韓信破齊，且欲擊楚，使龍且救齊。
translations.english: Xiang Yu heard that Han Xin had broken Qi and was about to attack Chu, so he sent Long Ju to rescue Qi.

translations.chinese: 漢果數挑成皋戰，楚軍不出，使人辱之數日，大司馬咎怒，渡兵汜水。
translations.english: Han repeatedly provoked battle at Chenggao, but the Chu army did not come out. They sent people to insult them for several days. Grand Marshal Jiu was angry and crossed his troops over Sishui River.

translations.chinese: 士卒半渡，漢擊之，大破楚軍，盡得楚國金玉貨賂。
translations.english: The soldiers were half across when Han attacked them, greatly defeating the Chu army and obtaining all of Chu's gold, jade, and treasures.

translations.chinese: 大司馬咎、長史欣皆自剄汜水上。
translations.english: Grand Marshal Jiu and Chief Secretary Xin both committed suicide on the Sishui.

translations.chinese: 漢王引兵渡河，復取成皋，軍廣武，就敖倉食。
translations.english: King Han led troops across the river, recaptured Chenggao, and encamped at Guangwu, drawing provisions from Aocang.
